verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: O beloved! Have you not seen how your Lord dealt with the men of the Elephant?
verse.verse_2: Did He not cause their device to be ruined?
verse.verse_3: And He sent against them flocks of birds.
verse.verse_4: Striking them against stones of baked clay.
verse.verse_5: And thus made them like broken straw eaten up.
